experiences.description: At Visto Tecnologia, I act as a transformation agent, integrating artificial intelligence into retail solutions. I manage the complete lifecycle of applications, from development to deployment, with a rigorous focus on observability and performance. My deliveries result in scalable and high-quality systems, ensuring efficiency and continuous monitoring.

As a Full Stack Developer at Mtrix, I led the architecture and development of a crucial solution for file generation and versioning, optimizing how users interact with Big Data. My contribution included creating interactive dashboards in Qlik Sense and solving real-time problems, driving efficiency and strategic decision-making.

At Divam Oficial, I performed a strategic refactoring of the login and authentication system, elevating security and user experience. I was the main responsible for implementing SEO strategies that increased online visibility and led the successful adoption of OAuth authentication, ensuring a safer and more efficient digital ecosystem.

I led the creation and implementation of a design system with Angular, standardizing user experience and elevating development efficiency. My initiative resulted in a reusable component framework, documented with Storybook, which accelerated project delivery and ensured consistency across all company applications.

I contributed to digital portfolio modernization, actively participating in website maintenance and improvement. I was essential in developing and integrating a new product, ensuring its performance and responsiveness across a wide range of devices, from smartphones to 4K screens, demonstrating adaptability and focus on user experience.

I actively participated in delivering high-visibility web projects, including Landing Pages and institutional websites, for major clients like XP Inc. group. My work focused on collaboration with multidisciplinary teams, applying Scrum methodology to ensure efficient deliveries aligned with client expectations.
